Reviews.Title: “Only a 2*star hotel at best”
Reviews.Author: Islanders09
Reviews.Content: husband couple stayed 3 nights expecting hotel based hotel rating reviews read trip advisor disappointed biggest issue hotel advertised airconditioning airconditioning system installed arrived temperatures midtwenties venice stay 4th floor poorly ventilated hotel tiny thirty degrees sleepy impossible complained front desk response boss hasnt advised staff hotel advertised airconditioning mention operational seasonally staff concerned complaints boss contacted complaint breakfast hotel disappointing consisted canned pears prunes yogurt bread rolls cereal option bad kept replenishing supply items yogurt tray empty canned fruit gone time refilled hotel location near rialto bridge difficult price paid im found nicer hotels recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great staff and location, very bad beds”
Reviews.Author: Marducita
Reviews.Content: location located close rialto bridge walking distance piazza san marco city cars thats didnt walk suitcases arrival departure vaporetto rialto bridge ok clean nice didnt decoration furniture cheap wasnt bad worst bed matresses hard broken loose springs hurt bodies uncomfortable beds didnt sleep offered change matresses heating horrible loud noise fixed third night bathroom fine recently renovated lack shower curtain tub ok shower didnt wet floor internet free wifi breakfast breakfast managed table breakfast fine hotel staff helpful nice smile willing solve help city questions customer service conclusion reasonable price hotel changed matresses ones improve lot quality stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Spacious, clean and very conventiently-located!”
Reviews.Author: flowermenza
Reviews.Content: hotel conveniently located heart 1minute walk rialto bridge waterbus stop price competitive amenities staff helpful ensure directions choose venue event attend drawback bit noisy street located guess somehow comes venice due relatively narrow beautiful streets adjacent buildings overall hotel stay venice

Reviews.Title: “Excellent choice in Venice”
Reviews.Author: kutlu
Reviews.Content: despite reviews concentrated difficult hotel choice stayed 3 days yes little bit difficult impossible follow instructions web site hesitate hotel placed 2 minutes rialto bridge 15 minutes san marco breakfast fine staff helpful friendly

Reviews.Title: “The staff made it worthwhile”
Reviews.Author: travelcritic22
Reviews.Content: picked locationnot drag suitcases water bus hard thats allure venice clean except space 3rd floor overlooked courtyard noisey time thanks restaurant charming hotel hotel staff especially
